# endLocation

**Instance Property**

The expected end location

## Declaration

```swift
var endLocation: Point3D? { get }
```

## Getting the position and location

- **pose**: The current pose of the main interaction object
- **locationOnTable**: The 2D location of the main interaction object
- **endLocationOnTable**: The expected end 2D location of the main interaction object
